LoL at everybody debating the believablility of an eromanga where a remarkably developed girl in jr high picks a fight with local thugs based on her desire to emulate what she’d seen in super sentai type shows. 
The consequences where she’s easily defeated, kidnapped and then fucked by force seem believable to me. The part where she starts cumming and falls in love with their dicks and is in no way scarred and traumatized by the experience is obviously fantasy but it’s trope that is a long established hentai staple that it hardly merits any debate over realism

@The Way of The Thighs Immersion, that's why. These are sexual fantasies, but even fantasy needs a level of realism to help with immersion. Otherwise there's too much of a disconnect and it becomes an ineffective fantasy.

Sorry to break it to you manlets but this is precisely what happens when you go and fight someone almost 2 times your size just because you learned a bunch of glorified dance moves aka "martial arts". 
Save your money and invest in a good pair of running shoes, pepper spray and pocket knife instead. If laws allow, get a taser/gun instead.
And if you are still falling for the marital arts meme, go to a school that teaches you actual full resistance combat experience instead of fake rule based 'sparring' and focuses on strength building too. Not as good as the former investment.
